mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM,a.* FROM( SELECT b.BIDX,p.PIDX,b.BORDER_NUM,p.PNAME,sum(bo.boprice * bo.bocount) as price,count(bo.bidx) as count,p.PORDER_PRICE,b.BORDER_STATUS,TO_CHAR(p.PSUMNAIL) as psumnail,b.BDATE FROM BUYS b left outer join PRODUCTS p on p.DIDX =b.DIDX left outer join buys_options bo on bo.bidx=b.bidx WHERE b.UIDX =${uidx} AND b.PDIDX =0 AND P.PIDX = b.PIDX AND b.bdate BETWEEN '${stDay}' and '${endDay}' group by b.BIDX,p.PIDX,b.BORDER_NUM,p.PNAME,P.PRICE,p.PORDER_PRICE,b.BORDER_STATUS,TO_CHAR(p.PSUMNAIL),b.BDATE ORDER BY BDATE DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ${beginRecord} AND ${endRecord}
